definition: erhua variant of 男孩[nan2 hai2]
male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: I threw the brick because no one else would stop.
sentences.chinese: 我丢砖块是因为没有人停下来，小男孩儿声泪俱下。

sentences.english: This naughty boy the profile that picture choosing keeps from him Todd.
sentences.chinese: 这幅调皮男孩儿的画像选自托德自己写的小传。

sentences.english: The boy did what he could.
sentences.chinese: 这个男孩儿做了他能够做的。

sentences.english: I got some great shots of the boy who plays the guitar on the left.
sentences.chinese: 我拍了几张特榜的在左边弹吉他的男孩儿照片。

sentences.english: Some boys tailed after the parade.
sentences.chinese: 有些小男孩儿紧紧跟在游行队伍后面。

sentences.english: The gardener shouted abuse at the boy for stealing his peaches.
sentences.chinese: 园丁把偷桃的男孩儿大骂一顿。

sentences.english: Donghae, known as the queen, is a beautiful boy.
sentences.chinese: 东海，也被叫做女王，是一个很漂亮的男孩儿。

sentences.english: The boy keeps the seesaw in balance.
sentences.chinese: 这个男孩儿让跷跷板保持平衡。

sentences.english: Then the boy opened his mouth , he had not a tooth left!
sentences.chinese: 这时，男孩儿张开了嘴巴，他的牙全被拔光了。

sentences.english: The bys are starting school on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 男孩儿们星期一就要开学了。

sentences.english: This boy likes to rubber-neck in class.
sentences.chinese: 这个男孩儿上课爱东张西望。

sentences.english: By the little boy's father, appearing right behind the Jap !
sentences.chinese: 那小男孩儿的父亲，就站在那日本鬼子的后面。

sentences.english: Mom, can boys have long hair?
sentences.chinese: 妈妈，男孩儿能留长发吗？

sentences.english: There once was a little boy who had a bad temper .
sentences.chinese: 从前，有个小男孩儿，脾气很坏。

sentences.english: The boy wore a shirt with the neck open, showing his bare chest.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩儿穿着一件衬衫，颈部敞开，露出光光的胸膛。

sentences.english: The boy, who was unscathed by his ordeal, left the mall with his father.
sentences.chinese: 这名大难不死的男孩儿随后同他的爸爸离开了商场。

definition: erhua variant of 女孩[nu:3 hai2]
mythological daughter of Fiery Emperor 炎帝[Yan2 di4] who turned into bird Jingwei 精衛|精卫[Jing1 wei4] after drowning
erhua variant of 小孩[xiao3 hai2]
